languages.text: "Я стала все чаще видеть ее в тенях, на краю зрения, в собственном отражении... И во тьме клетки гемункула меня поджидала именно она — я это точно знаю!" {n}Кассия обреченно вздыхает, прикрывая глаза ладонью.{/n} "Теперь... вы знаете мою последнюю тайну, Лорд-капитан. Думаете, я схожу с ума?"

traits.locale_text: "Я стала все чаще видеть ее в тенях, на краю зрения, в собственном отражении... И во тьме клетки Гемункула меня поджидала именно она — я это точно знаю!" {n}Кассия обреченно вздыхает, прикрывая глаза ладонью.{/n} "Теперь... вы знаете мою последнюю тайну, Лорд-капитан. Думаете, я схожу с ума?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I began to see her ever more often — in shadows, at the edge of my vision, in my own reflection... And it was she, too, who waited for me in the darkness of the Haemonculus's cage. I know it for certain!" {n}Cassia sighs dejectedly and covers her eyes with her hand.{/n} "Now... you know the last of my secrets, Lord Captain. Do you think I'm going insane?"
languages.original_text: "Я стала все чаще видеть ее в тенях, на краю зрения, в собственном отражении... И во тьме клетки гемункула меня поджидала именно она — я это точно знаю!" {n}Кассия обреченно вздыхает, прикрывая глаза ладонью.{/n} "Теперь... вы знаете мою последнюю тайну, Лорд-капитан. Думаете, я схожу с ума?"

And it was she, too, who waited for me in the darkness of the Haemonculus's cage. I know it for certain!" {n}Cassia sighs dejectedly and covers her eyes with her hand.{/n} "Now... you know the last of my secrets, Lord Captain. Do you think I'm going insane?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我开始越来越频繁地看到她，无论是阴影里，还是视线的边缘。甚至在我自己的倒影中……看到的也是她的面孔。而且，在血伶人黑暗的囚笼中等待我的人，也是她。我非常肯定！”{n}卡西娅沮丧地叹了口气，用手遮住了双眼。{/n}“如今……你已经知道了我最后的秘密，舰长大人。你是不是觉得我要疯了？”
languages.original_text: "I began to see her ever more often — in shadows, at the edge of my vision, in my own reflection... And it was she, too, who waited for me in the darkness of the Haemonculus's cage. I know it for certain!" {n}Cassia sighs dejectedly and covers her eyes with her hand.{/n} "Now... you know the last of my secrets, Lord Captain. Do you think I'm going insane?"

traits.locale_text: “我开始越来越频繁地看到她，无论是阴影里，还是视线的边缘。甚至在我自己的倒影中……看到的也是她的面孔。而且，在血伶人黑暗的囚笼中等待我的人，也是她。我非常肯定！”{n}卡西娅沮丧地叹了口气，用手遮住了双眼。{/n}“如今……你已经知道了我最后的秘密，舰长大人。你是不是觉得我要疯了？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I began to see her ever more often — in shadows, at the edge of my vision, in my own reflection... And it was she, too, who waited for me in the darkness of the Haemonculus's cage. I know it for certain!" {n}Cassia sighs dejectedly and covers her eyes with her hand.{/n} "Now... you know the last of my secrets, Lord Captain. Do you think I'm going insane?"

languages.text: «Empecé a verla con una frecuencia cada vez mayor. En las sombras, por el rabillo del ojo, en mi reflejo... Y también era ella quien me esperaba en las tinieblas de la jaula del Hemónculo. ¡Estoy segura!». {n}Cassia suspira, abatida, y se tapa los ojos con la mano.{/n} «Bueno... ya conoce mis secretos, Lord Capitán. ¿Cree que me estoy volviendo loca?».
languages.original_text: "I began to see her ever more often — in shadows, at the edge of my vision, in my own reflection... And it was she, too, who waited for me in the darkness of the Haemonculus's cage. I know it for certain!" {n}Cassia sighs dejectedly and covers her eyes with her hand.{/n} "Now... you know the last of my secrets, Lord Captain. Do you think I'm going insane?"

traits.locale_text: «Empecé a verla con una frecuencia cada vez mayor. En las sombras, por el rabillo del ojo, en mi reflejo... Y también era ella quien me esperaba en las tinieblas de la jaula del Hemónculo. ¡Estoy segura!». {n}Cassia suspira, abatida, y se tapa los ojos con la mano.{/n} «Bueno... ya conoce mis secretos, Lord Capitán. ¿Cree que me estoy volviendo loca?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「彼女を見る頻度は増していきました。影の中、視界の端、自分の姿…ハモンキュラスの檻の暗闇で私を待っていたのも彼女でした。間違いありません！」{n}カシアは意気消沈したようにため息をつき、手で目を覆う。{/n}「さあ…あなたは私の最後の秘密を知りました、ロード・キャプテン。私が正気を失っていると思われますか？」
languages.original_text: "I began to see her ever more often — in shadows, at the edge of my vision, in my own reflection... And it was she, too, who waited for me in the darkness of the Haemonculus's cage. I know it for certain!" {n}Cassia sighs dejectedly and covers her eyes with her hand.{/n} "Now... you know the last of my secrets, Lord Captain. Do you think I'm going insane?"

traits.locale_text: 「彼女を見る頻度は増していきました。影の中、視界の端、自分の姿…ハモンキュラスの檻の暗闇で私を待っていたのも彼女でした。間違いありません！」{n}カシアは意気消沈したようにため息をつき、手で目を覆う。{/n}「さあ…あなたは私の最後の秘密を知りました、ロード・キャプテン。私が正気を失っていると思われますか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich begann, sie immer öfter zu sehen — in Schatten, am Rande meines Blickfeldes, in meinem eigenen Spiegelbild ... Und sie war es auch, die im dunklen Käfig des Haemonculus auf mich wartete. Ich weiß es ganz gewiss!" {n}Cassia seufzt niedergeschlagen und bedeckt ihre Augen mit der Hand.{/n} "Nun ... kennt Ihr das letzte meiner Geheimnisse, Lord Captain. Glaubt Ihr, ich werde wahnsinnig?"
languages.original_text: "I began to see her ever more often — in shadows, at the edge of my vision, in my own reflection... And it was she, too, who waited for me in the darkness of the Haemonculus's cage. I know it for certain!" {n}Cassia sighs dejectedly and covers her eyes with her hand.{/n} "Now... you know the last of my secrets, Lord Captain. Do you think I'm going insane?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich begann, sie immer öfter zu sehen — in Schatten, am Rande meines Blickfeldes, in meinem eigenen Spiegelbild ... Und sie war es auch, die im dunklen Käfig des Haemonculus auf mich wartete. Ich weiß es ganz gewiss!" {n}Cassia seufzt niedergeschlagen und bedeckt ihre Augen mit der Hand.{/n} "Nun ... kennt Ihr das letzte meiner Geheimnisse, Lord Captain. Glaubt Ihr, ich werde wahnsinnig?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Après cet incident, je la voyais encore plus souvent : dans les ombres, à la limite de mon champ de vision, dans mon propre reflet... Et c'est elle qui m'attendait dans les ténèbres de la cage de l'hémoncule. J'en suis certaine ! » {n}Cassia pousse un long soupir de découragement et couvre ses yeux d'une main.{/n} « Voilà... Vous connaissez désormais tous mes secrets, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Qu'en pensez-vous ? Suis-je en train de devenir folle ? »
languages.original_text: "I began to see her ever more often — in shadows, at the edge of my vision, in my own reflection... And it was she, too, who waited for me in the darkness of the Haemonculus's cage. I know it for certain!" {n}Cassia sighs dejectedly and covers her eyes with her hand.{/n} "Now... you know the last of my secrets, Lord Captain. Do you think I'm going insane?"

traits.locale_text: « Après cet incident, je la voyais encore plus souvent : dans les ombres, à la limite de mon champ de vision, dans mon propre reflet... Et c'est elle qui m'attendait dans les ténèbres de la cage de l'hémoncule. J'en suis certaine ! » {n}Cassia pousse un long soupir de découragement et couvre ses yeux d'une main.{/n} « Voilà... Vous connaissez désormais tous mes secrets, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Qu'en pensez-vous ? Suis-je en train de devenir folle ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "O kadını daha da sık görmeye başladım... Gölgelerde, gözümün ucunda, kendi yansımamda... Haimonkulus'un kafesinde, karanlıkta beni bekleyen de o kadındı. Bundan adım gibi eminim!" {n}Cassia, kederle iç çekip eliyle gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "Evet... Sırlarımın hepsini öğrenmiş oldun Lord Kaptan. Sence deliriyor muyum?"
languages.original_text: "I began to see her ever more often — in shadows, at the edge of my vision, in my own reflection... And it was she, too, who waited for me in the darkness of the Haemonculus's cage. I know it for certain!" {n}Cassia sighs dejectedly and covers her eyes with her hand.{/n} "Now... you know the last of my secrets, Lord Captain. Do you think I'm going insane?"

traits.locale_text: "O kadını daha da sık görmeye başladım... Gölgelerde, gözümün ucunda, kendi yansımamda... Haimonkulus'un kafesinde, karanlıkta beni bekleyen de o kadındı. Bundan adım gibi eminim!" {n}Cassia kederle iç çekip eliyle gözlerini kapatıyor.{/n} "O hâlde... Artık sırlarımın hepsini öğrenmiş oldun Lord Kaptan. Sence deliriyor muyum?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
